content.title: Nirman Shramik Avm Unke Aashrit Bacchon Dwara Bhartiya Rajasthan Prashasnik Seva Hetu Aayojit Pratibhabhik Yojana
content.details: The scheme 'Nirman Shramik Avm Unke Aashrit Bacchon Dwara Bhartiya Rajasthan Prashasnik Seva Hetu Aayojit Pratibhabhik Yojana' initiated by the Labor Department of Rajasthan aims to foster the integration of children of registered beneficiaries engaged in construction and other related works into the mainstream of development. Through this program, the government seeks to provide opportunities for the children of laborers and workers involved in construction activities to access education and skill development, thereby enhancing their prospects for a better future. By facilitating the participation of these children in educational and skill-building programs, the scheme endeavors to break the cycle of intergenerational poverty prevalent among families engaged in manual labor. By empowering the youth with education and skills, the government aims to equip them with the necessary tools to secure gainful employment opportunities and contribute meaningfully to the socio-economic development of Rajasthan.
benefits: On passing the preliminary examination of Indian Administrative Service – ₹1,00,000/-
On passing the preliminary examination of Rajasthan Administrative Service – ₹50,000/-
eligibility: Applicant should be registered construction workers who are continuously depositing contributions
The annual income of the applicant parents from all sources should not exceed ₹2,50,000/-
Applicant who are already working in government services will not be given benefits.
The applicant must have passed the following preliminary competitive examination: Indian Administrative Service, Rajasthan Administrative Service.
No benefit will be payable under this scheme for administrative examination of states other than Rajasthan state.
Incentive amount will be given maximum once only for Indian Administrative Service and Rajasthan Administrative Service.

If any fact is found to be false in the information given by the beneficiary in the assistance application submitted under the scheme, then it will be the responsibility of the concerned beneficiary to deposit the entire amount of assistance accepted under the scheme in one lump sum along with interest.
documents_required: Copy of the registration identity card of the beneficiary.
Copy of the beneficiary's Aadhaar card and Jan Aadhaar card.
Copy of the first page of the candidate's savings bank account passbook (which contains the candidate's name, bank account number and IFS code).
Self-attested copy of the mark sheet/certificate of the competitive examination passed by the candidate.

faqs.question: What is the objective of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The Labor department of Rajasthan started 'Nirman Shramik Avm Unke Aashrit Bacchon Dwara Bhartiya Rajasthan Prashasnik Seva Hetu Aayojit Pratibhabhik Yojana' to help the children of construction workers.

faqs.question: What benefits are provided under the scheme?
faqs.answer: Financial benefits are provided under the scheme.

faqs.question: How much financial benefits are provided?
faqs.answer: On passing the preliminary examination of Indian Administrative Service – ₹1,00,000/-; On passing the preliminary examination of Rajasthan Administrative Service – ₹50,000/-.

faqs.question: What documents are required?
faqs.answer: Copy of the registration identity card of the beneficiary; Copy of the beneficiary's Aadhaar card and Jan Aadhaar card; Copy of the first page of the candidate's savings bank account passbook; Self-attested copy of the mark sheet/certificate of the competitive examination passed by the candidate.

faqs.question: What is Bhamashah Card?
faqs.answer: All family members of women who have a Bhamashah Yojana card can use the card to access the benefits of this scheme.

faqs.question: Can applicant get the scheme benefits for other state administrative service exam?
faqs.answer: No benefit will be payable under this scheme for administrative examination of states other than Rajasthan state.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility criteria on the basis of annual income?
faqs.answer: The annual income of the applicant parents from all sources should not exceed ₹2,50,000/-.

faqs.question: How many times benefits under this scheme?
faqs.answer: Incentive amount will be given maximum once only.

faqs.question: What is labor card?
faqs.answer: A labour card is an identity card issued by the government to workers in the unorganized sector.

faqs.question: How applicant can apply online?
faqs.answer: Applicants have to visit the official portal https://sso.rajasthan.gov.in/ and follow the steps.
